name: Science for the People / Skeptically Speaking

episodes.title: 002 - Science of Cults (as Skeptically Speaking)
episodes.description:
This episode originally aired on 27 March 2009 when Science for the People was known as Skeptically Speaking.

---

002 - Science of Cults

Dr. Stephen Kent discusses brainwashing, ritual abuse and the difference between cults and religions. And on Speaking Up: potty training with Brad Salomons.

Guests: Stephen Kent, Brad Salomons
